author: Peter O'Sullivan
comment: I love it too!  I wanted to ask if it could be an Android widget too, but this was asked by the reviewer before me.  Makes me want to get an Android Wear Device just to be able to use this Watch Face.

author: D LS5
comment: What a great app!  I'm using a Swiss railway clock as my analog clock widget for an android tablet.  Would love to use this instead.  I  particularly like the cool second hand - it's kinda mesmerizing.   Please think about developing an android version - I'm sure it would be a hit!

author: ikt
comment: Love it! Can this also be a widget?

reply.author: Pixplicity
reply.content: Thank you! Unfortunately, nope :( Limitations in the Android platform prevent us from doing fancy animations in widgets.

author: Raymond Keattch
comment: I am a signaller on the UK railways. I always use an analogue watch face to keep trains to time.  I love the look and movement of this watch face. However, I can't use it at work because it does not display the date!  The real clocks may not show the date, but It would be great to have the option to have a date window. Five stars from me when a date option is included.  Also the hour and minute hand shadows appear to show the light source as the ground occasionally!

reply.author: Pixplicity
reply.content: Thanks, great to hear such positive feedback! We aimed to keep the design as true to the original as possible, finding it easy enough to find the date by pulling down the notification tray from the top of the display. The shadows are determined from the watch's accelerometer, so perhaps the sensor is a bit off.

title: Great!

author: BBB GROUP
comment: I'm a real dutch-trains lover, so this watch face make it all clear in my watch! ^_^
title: I love it!

author: Thifane Albuquerque
comment: Genius! Exactly like the real thing

author: Andrew Stribblehill
comment: I love this! It's so elegantly minimalistic and utterly analogue!

author: Daniele Bonaldo
comment: Perfect replica of the real railways clocks, including the characteristic movement

reply.author: Pixplicity
reply.content: Thanks for the compliment! Getting the movement right was quite fun to build!

title: Like the real ones

author: Martin Schimmel
comment: Leuk gemaakt, vooral de meebewegende schaduw is gaaf. Voor dagelijks gebruik vind ik m niks (ik heb graag een digitale klok, batterij status, etc), maar mooi istie wel :)

reply.author: Pixplicity
reply.content: Bedankt voor de positieve review! De schaduw was ook erg leuk om te maken. Wat dagelijks gebruik betreft kunnen we ons dat best voorstellen. We houden deze vooral bij het zo precies mogelijk nabootsen van de klokken van de NS. Bij toekomstige watchfaces bouwen we zulke details er zeker ook weer in!

author: Joop Peek
comment: Ok ziet er cool uit ... maar nu nog een versie die ook op Samsung Gear (Tizen) draait.

reply.author: Pixplicity
reply.content: We zijn blij dat je hem cool vindt! Tizen is, zoals iOS Watchkit, helaas een heel ander platform dan Android Wear en veel minder toegankelijk. Mochten Samsung en Apple hier verandering in brengen dan zullen we er zeker weer naar kijken!

reply.author: Pixplicity
reply.content: We can understand that sentiment, considering opinions of the design of the Dutch Railway clocks are quite diverse. Our primary goal is to simply replicate this historic clock as closely as possible. Perhaps the Dutch Railways will see your comment and consider changing their designs to something more modern and classy! ;)
